translations: [高分子] 离聚物，[高分子] 离子交联聚合物

sentences.sentence: The tensile strength of the ionomers increases and the ultimate elongation decreases with the increase of sulfonate content.
sentences.translation: 随着磺酸盐含量的增加，离聚体的拉伸强度增大，伸长率下降。

sentences.sentence: Liquid crystalline ionomers are a new kind of polymers which have the characteristics of both liquid crystalline polymers and ionomers.
sentences.translation: 液晶离聚物是一种具有液晶聚合物和离子聚合物双重特性的一类高聚物。

sentences.sentence: Liquid crystalline ionomer (LCI) is a new kind of polymer which has the structure characteristics of both liquid crystalline polymers and ionomers.
sentences.translation: 液晶离聚物是一种兼具液晶高分子和离聚物结构特征的新型聚合物。
